en: Narrator: It is raining today. So Peppa and George cannot play outside.
cn: 旁白：今天下雨了，所以佩奇和乔治不能在外面玩。

examples.en: It is snowing today.
It is sunny today.

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, it's stopped raining.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，雨停了。

en: Peppa Pig: Can we go out to play?
cn: 小猪佩奇：我们可以出去玩吗？

sentence.en: Can we go out to play?

examples.en: Can we go to the park?
Can we go to the zoo?

en: Daddy Pig: All right, run along you two.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，你们两个快去玩吧。

en: Narrator: Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentence.en: Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles.
sentence.cn: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

examples.en: Peppa loves playing with her friends.
examples.cn: 佩奇喜欢和她的朋友们玩。

examples.en: Peppa loves eating ice cream.

en: Peppa Pig: I love muddy puddles.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我喜欢泥坑。

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，如果你要跳泥坑，必须穿上靴子。

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, Mummy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对不起，妈妈。

en: Narrator: George likes to jump in muddy puddles, too.
cn: 旁白：乔治也喜欢跳泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: George. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，如果你要跳泥坑，必须穿上靴子。

sentence.en: If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
sentence.cn: 如果你要跳泥坑，必须穿上靴子。

examples.en: If you go swimming, you must wear a swimsuit.
examples.cn: 如果你去游泳，你必须穿泳衣。

examples.en: If you ride a bike, you must wear a helmet.
examples.cn: 如果你骑自行车，你必须戴头盔。

en: Narrator: Peppa likes to look after her little brother, George.
cn: 旁白：佩奇喜欢照顾她的弟弟乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: George, let's find some more puddles.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，我们再找几个泥坑吧。

examples.en: Let's find some more toys.
Let's find some more friends.

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

en: Narrator: Peppa has found a little puddle.
cn: 旁白：佩奇发现了一个小泥坑。

sentence.en: Peppa has found a little puddle.
sentence.cn: 佩奇发现了一个小泥坑。

examples.en: Peppa has found a big puddle.
examples.cn: 佩奇发现了一个大泥坑。

examples.en: Peppa has found a small toy.
examples.cn: 佩奇发现了一个小玩具。

en: Narrator: George has found a big puddle.
cn: 旁白：乔治发现了一个大泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: Look, George. There's a really big puddle.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，你看，有一个很大的泥坑。

en: Narrator: George wants to jump into the big puddle first.
cn: 旁白：乔治想先跳进那个大泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: Stop, George.
cn: 小猪佩奇：停下，乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: I must check if it's safe for you.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我得检查一下对你来说安不安全。

sentence.en: I must check if it's safe for you.
sentence.cn: 我得检查一下对你来说安不安全。

examples.en: I must check if it's safe to swim.
examples.cn: 我得检查一下游泳是否安全。

examples.en: I must check if it's safe to ride a bike.
examples.cn: 我得检查一下骑自行车是否安全。

en: Peppa Pig: Good. It is safe for you.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好了，对你来说很安全。

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, George. It's only mud.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对不起，乔治，只是泥巴。

examples.en: It's only water.
It's only a toy.

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治都喜欢跳泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: Come on, George.
cn: 小猪佩奇：快点，乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: Let's go and show Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我们去给爸爸看看吧。

examples.en: Let's go and show Mummy.
Let's go and show our friends.

en: Daddy Pig: Goodness me.
cn: 猪爸爸：天哪。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy. Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，爸爸。

en: Peppa Pig: Guess what we've been doing.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你猜我们刚才在做什么？

sentence.cn: 你猜我们刚才在做什么？

examples.en: Guess what we've been playing.
examples.cn: 你猜我们刚才在玩什么。

examples.en: Guess what we've been eating.
examples.cn: 你猜我们刚才在吃什么。

en: Daddy Pig: Let me think...
cn: 猪爸爸：让我想想……

en: Daddy Pig: Have you been watching television?
cn: 猪爸爸：你们是去看电视了吗？

examples.en: Have you been playing outside?
Have you been eating sweets?

en: Peppa Pig: No. No. Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：不是，不是，爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Have you just had a bath?
cn: 猪爸爸：你们刚洗完澡吗？

en: Peppa Pig: No. No.
cn: 小猪佩奇：不是，不是。

en: Daddy Pig: I know. You've been jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 猪爸爸：我知道了，你们在跳泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes. Yes. Daddy. We've been jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对，对，爸爸，我们在跳泥坑。

en: Daddy Pig: Ho. Ho. And look at the mess you're in.
cn: 猪爸爸：呵呵，看看你们弄得多脏。

sentence.en: look at the mess you're in.

examples.en: look at the mess you've made.
look at the mess on the floor.

en: Peppa Pig: Oooh...
cn: 小猪佩奇：哦……

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, well, it's only mud.
cn: 猪爸爸：没关系，只是泥巴。

en: Daddy Pig: Let's clean up quickly before Mummy sees the mess.
cn: 猪爸爸：我们赶快清理干净，别让妈妈看到。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, when we've cleaned up, will you and Mummy come and play, too?
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，我们清理干净后，你和妈妈也一起来玩吗？

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, we can all play in the garden.
cn: 猪爸爸：好啊，我们大家一起去花园玩。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are wearing their boots.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治穿上了靴子。

sentence.en: Peppa and George are wearing their boots.
sentence.cn: 佩奇和乔治穿上了靴子。

examples.en: Peppa and George are wearing their hats.
examples.cn: 佩奇和乔治戴上了帽子。

examples.en: Peppa and George are wearing their coats.
examples.cn: 佩奇和乔治穿上了外套。

en: Narrator: Mummy and Daddy are wearing their boots.
cn: 旁白：妈妈和爸爸也穿上了靴子。

en: Narrator: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Narrator: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, Daddy Pig, look at the mess you're in.
cn: 猪妈妈：哦，猪爸爸，看看你弄得多脏。

en: Peppa Pig: It's only mud.
cn: 小猪佩奇：只是泥巴。
